channel.title: 667/711 User's Rights / Admin/Mod/Donator
channel.description:
hey i use to code i quit now im back i kno how to edit 677/711
but i dont how to change users rights ? i went to Soures/data/character/username.p but i cant read it. please tell me wat to open the .p or .bin or both, wat i should open with. and
how do i make my self admin?
k no tur out their so im gona show how to do it i found out.
1. go to soures\src\com\rs\game\player 2. find player.java 3. Search for [code=actionscript3]if (username.equalsIgnoreCase[/code] 4. should get something like this [code=actionscript3]if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("owner"))[/code] 5. where it says OWNER!! you should enter your desired username
6... Compile.......

@cashis000 wrote:

hey i use to code i quit now im back i kno how to edit 677/711

but i dont how to change users rights ?
i went to Soures/data/character/username.p but i cant read it. please tell me wat to open the .p or .bin or both, wat i should open with.
and

how do i make my self admin?

k no tur out their so im gona show how to do it i found out.

  1. go to soures\src\com\rs\game\player
  2. find player.java
  3. Search for if (username.equalsIgnoreCase
  4. should get something like this if (username.equalsIgnoreCase("owner"))
  5. where it says OWNER!! you should enter your desired username

6… Compile…
